pr_title: worldhopper: Fix other favorited worlds to retain menu state after re…

timeline.bodyText: This method is no longer used after this change, delete it from WorldSwitcherPanel.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.message: worldhopper: Fix other favorited worlds to retain menu state after removing a favorited world

timeline.bodyText: Is this actually necessary? removeFromFavorites looks like it is already correctly updating the favorite menu so I don't see why this is required.
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: I've tested this and it seems unnecesary
replies.author: Adam-
